definition.text: The Default Exchange is the one referenced by the Exchange Data Tasks, Exchange Trading Tasks, Exchange Learning Tasks nodes of which a certain Task decends from. The Trading Bot running inside that Task will considere that referenced exchange to be it's Default Exchange.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
